name: @github/remote-input-element
description: An input element that sends its value to a server endpoint and renders the response body.

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint && mkdir dist
scripts.build-umd: BABEL_ENV=umd babel index.js -o dist/index.umd.js && cp index.js.flow dist/index.umd.js.flow
scripts.build-esm: BABEL_ENV=esm babel index.js -o dist/index.esm.js && cp index.js.flow dist/index.esm.js.flow
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
